data.title: Using filters
data.description: The ERT pack includes an empty filter holder and a filter holder with a UHC filter dedicated to nebula observation. The UHC (Ultra High Contrast) filter is designed for visual deep sky observation. It transmits 100% of the light from O-III and H-beta spectral lines, 96% of the H-alpha line (although its use is mainly reserved for imaging) and blocks all other wavelengths. This cleans up the image from stray light caused by light pollution. This enhances the contrast of diffuse and planetary nebulae, which then stand out against a now very dark sky background.
